fields.description: A set of <<custom-field-option-request,custom field options>> to be created alongside the newly created custom field. Should only be used if the custom field type supports options
Whether the newly created custom field will be active or not
A more detailed description of the custom field
The name of the custom field
What position the newly created custom field should appear in, relative to other custom fields on this object
The data type of the custom field.
